title: To All My Friends on Shore

sources.description: An airport redcap works hard to get his family out of the ghetto, only to discover that his son has sickle-cell anemia. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/to-all-my-friends-on-shore-1972/

sources.title: To All My Friends on Shore (1972) | Drama | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
An airport redcap works hard to get his family out of the ghetto, only to discover that his son has sickle-cell anemia.

Director: Gilbert Cates
Writers: Bill Cosby, Allan Sloane
Stars: Bill Cosby, Gloria Foster, Dennis Hines 
Genres: Drama
